pilotboy_84 wrote:
> Hellow everyone:
> I have a dude about robots-honoring-policy. I'm using Heritrix 1.14.1
> and i confugred that policy to ignore the robots.txt. So, my question
> is: Why if the robots-honoring-policy is set to ignore the crawler
> download or try to download the robots.txt file?
> Is there any way to cancel that operation?
